references.paper_title: Design-bench: Benchmarks for data-driven offline model-based optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces Design-Bench, the benchmark dataset used in the experiments, making it foundational to the paper's methodology and results.

references.paper_title: Offline model-based optimization via normalized maximum likelihood estimation
references.reason: This paper presents a key method for offline model-based optimization which the current work improves upon.
This paper introduces using diffusion models for black-box optimization, a technique that the current work builds upon and extends.

references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion models, which are central to the proposed method.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a core component of the proposed approach.
